plugins.name: Collect and Rename
plugins.description:
Collect and Rename allows users to easily collect text elements from a design document, rename them, and navigate to specific layers on different pages.


Main features:


1. Collection of text elements:

- The plugin automatically collects all text elements in the document.

2. Renaming texts:

- Ability to rename text layers directly in the plugin interface.

- After renaming, text layers are updated in real time.

3. Layer navigation:

- Ability to navigate to a specific layer, even if it is on a different page of the document.



How to use the plugin:


1. Installation and launch:

- Install the "Collect and Rename" plugin from the Figma Community.

- Open your project in Figma and launch the plugin through the "Plugins" menu.

2. Text collection:

- The plugin will automatically collect all text elements from the current document and display them in the interface.

3. Renaming texts:

- In the plugin interface, you will see a list of all text layers.

- For each text element:

- "Current text" shows the current text of the layer.

- "New text" provides a field for entering new text.

- Enter the new text in the "New text" field and press "Apply" or the Enter key to confirm.

- The layer text will be updated, and you will see a notification about a successful update.

4. Navigation to layers:

- Click on the text field of the layer to automatically navigate to it in the document, even if it is on a different page.

5. Closing the plugin:

- Close the plugin when you finish your work by pressing the "Close" button in the plugin interface.
plugins.tagline: The plugin shows all text layers in a list, making it easy to replace text.

plugins.name: Text Extractor
plugins.description:
üé• Watch the demo video here


Plugin Features


Extract Text from Selected Figma Frames

Easily extract text from selected frames. Whether you select a single frame or multiple frames, you can quickly extract all the text within them.


Automatically Generate Variable Names

Automatically convert extracted text into variable names using camelCase format. This feature supports English text only, ensuring consistent and clean variable naming for your projects.


Create Custom Delimiter Sets

Design your own delimiter sets to wrap text with brackets, quotes, or any custom markers. Use intuitive keyboard shortcuts to apply these delimiters, enhancing your workflow for variable processing and other text transformation tasks.


Easily Copy and Paste

Effortlessly copy the extracted text and variable names to paste into Google Sheets or other tools.


Switch Between Design and Dev Modes

Support both design and dev modes, with dev mode as the default. Use design mode for a compact interface.

138237.description:
üé• Watch the demo video here


Plugin Features


Extract Text from Selected Figma Frames

Easily extract text from selected frames. Whether you select a single frame or multiple frames, you can quickly extract all the text within them.


Automatically Generate Variable Names

Automatically convert extracted text into variable names using camelCase format. This feature supports English text only, ensuring consistent and clean variable naming for your projects.


Create Custom Delimiter Sets

Design your own delimiter sets to wrap text with brackets, quotes, or any custom markers. Use intuitive keyboard shortcuts to apply these delimiters, enhancing your workflow for variable processing and other text transformation tasks.


Easily Copy and Paste

Effortlessly copy the extracted text and variable names to paste into Google Sheets or other tools.


Switch Between Design and Dev Modes

Support both design and dev modes, with dev mode as the default. Use design mode for a compact interface.

plugins.name: Mendly ‚Äî Merge & Fix Broken Variables
plugins.description:
**Streamline your design system maintenance with powerful variable management tools.**


## Key Features


**üîÑ Smart Variable Merging**

- Combine duplicate color variables into one

- Automatically updates all references throughout your design

- Preserves semantic variable relationships

- Optional renaming during merge process


**üîß Broken Variable Detection & Repair**

- Scans current page for broken variable references

- Smart suggestions based on variable naming patterns

- Navigate between elements using the same broken variable

- Batch fix multiple variables at once


**‚ö° Intelligent Analysis**

- Shows direct vs semantic variable usage

- Counts affected elements before merging

- Identifies variable dependencies

- Context-aware replacement suggestions


**üéØ Perfect For**

- Design system cleanup and maintenance

- Removing duplicate variables after design updates

- Fixing broken references after variable deletions

- Streamlining color variable organization


**üí° How It Works**

1. Select source variable (will be removed) and target variable (will remain)

2. Preview affected elements and usage statistics

3. Merge variables with one click - all references automatically update

4. Use the fix tool to repair any broken variable links


Save hours of manual work and keep your design system clean and organized!
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly merge duplicate variables and fix broken references in your design system.

plugins.name: TRANS-AI
plugins.description:
TRANS-AI helps designers create multilingual designs by translating text layers and automatically adjusting layouts for right-to-left languages.


Key Features:

  1. Translate selected text layers using OpenAI, Anthropic, or Gemini API (bring your own API key)
  2. One-click layout conversion between RTL and LTR designs
  3. Option to automatically adjust layouts when translating to/from RTL languages
  4. Exclude specific layers from translation using the layer name filter
  5. Preserves text formatting while converting layouts


Perfect for teams creating multilingual products, localizing interfaces, or working with global audiences. TRANS-AI streamlines the localization workflow, saving designers hours of manual adjustments when adapting designs for different languages.
plugins.tagline: Go global in seconds! AI-powered translation with smart RTL/LTR layout conversion.

plugins.name: Chroma Forge
plugins.description:
Chroma Forge for Figma


A powerful color selection plugin for Figma that provides an intuitive color wheel and advanced color harmony tools to create consistent color palettes.


Features


Interactive Color Wheel

  1. High-precision color selection with a fully interactive color wheel
  2. Adjustable brightness and saturation sliders
  3. Real-time color preview
  4. HEX code input with validation


Color Harmony Tools

  1. Create cohesive color palettes using different harmony types:
  2. Analogous: Colors that are adjacent to each other on the color wheel
  3. Triad: Three colors evenly spaced around the color wheel
  4. Complementary: Colors opposite each other on the color wheel
  5. Split Complementary: A main color and two colors adjacent to its complement
  6. Square: Four colors evenly spaced around the color wheel
  7. Compound: A combination of complementary and analogous harmonies
  8. Mono: A single color with various shades
  9. Custom: Create your own custom harmony by placing markers freely


Flexible Color Selection

  1. Select 2-6 colors at once (depending on harmony type)
  2. Drag markers on the wheel to fine-tune your color selection
  3. Automatic contrast adjustment for optimal visibility


Figma Integration

  1. Apply selected colors directly to selected elements
  2. Create color styles from your palette
  3. Generate color variables with automatic shade variants (10% to 100% brightness)
  4. Intelligent naming system for organizing colors


How to Use


Select a Harmony Type: Choose from the dropdown menu to define how colors relate to each other

Select Number of Colors: Choose how many colors you want in your palette (2-6)

Choose Your Base Color: Click and drag on the color wheel or enter a HEX code

Adjust Saturation and Brightness: Use the sliders to fine-tune your colors

Apply Colors: Use the buttons to:

  1. Apply directly to selected elements
  2. Add to Figma color styles
  3. Add to Figma variables (with automatic shade creation)

plugins.name: Rename From Sublayer
plugins.description:
Rename from sublayers simplifies the process of renaming groups in Figma by automatically detecting image, text or shape layers within selected groups.


You can choose between five modes: image detection, text layer, Rectangle layer, ellipse layer and symbols detection.

Additionally, you can opt to rename all child groups within the hierarchy or just the top-level group, giving you full control over your naming conventions.


Key Features:

  1. Image, Text, Shape Detection: Automatically rename groups based on image names, text names, rectangle names, ellipse names and symbols.
  2. Selective Renaming: Choose to rename just the highest-level group or all nested child groups.
  3. User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive UI to quickly toggle between options.


Whether you're managing large design systems or working on a small project, Rename from sublayers helps keep your layers organized and your workflow efficient.
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly rename groups by image, text or shape layers.

plugins.name: Text to Frame Name
plugins.description:
The Figma plugin ‚ÄúText to Frame Name‚Äù is a handy tool that allows you to replace selected text with the name of the highest-level frame it belongs to, all at once. This is particularly useful for page numbers in presentation materials or proposals. For example, you can set frame names with sequential numbers like ‚Äú01,‚Äù ‚Äú02,‚Äù and ‚Äú03,‚Äù place temporary text (e.g., ‚Äú00‚Äù) on each page, select all the text, and run this plugin to complete page numbering. Even if you reorder or add pages, you can easily reset the numbers by simply modifying the frame names. This eliminates the need for manual number adjustments, significantly improving workflow efficiency.

For example, you can set frame names with sequential numbers like ‚Äú01,‚Äù ‚Äú02,‚Äù and ‚Äú03,‚Äù place temporary text (e.g., ‚Äú00‚Äù) on each page, select all the text, and run this plugin to complete page numbering. Even if you reorder or add pages, you can easily reset the numbers by simply modifying the frame names. This eliminates the need for manual number adjustments, significantly improving workflow efficiency.

plugins.name: Figmentation
plugins.description:
ü™Ñ Figmentation ‚Äì where Figma meets Autodocumentation


Tired of manual documentation?

Figmentation automates the process of extracting design tokens directly from your Figma components ‚Äî including colors, typography, spacing, borders, and effects.

With just one click, Figmentation creates a clean, organized annotation frame beside your component ‚Äî making handoff easier for developers and keeping your design system crystal clear.


Built by a designer who needed this ‚Äî and figured others might too.


üí° What it does:

Extracts bound design tokens from your components

Supports multiple naming conventions (camelCase, kebab-case, etc.)

Automatically detects and documents:

Backgrounds, text colors, border colors

Font sizes, families, weights, line heights, letter spacing

Padding, gap, corner radius, stroke weight

Shadows and blurs

Generates readable and structured annotation layers

Keeps token names consistent with your system ‚Äî or generates smart fallback names


üîß Use cases:

Design system maintenance

Dev handoff

Figma token organization

Fast, scalable documentation for UI libraries


‚ú® Made for:

Product designers

Design system leads

Developers using Figma tokens

Anyone who hates repetitive documentation

plugins.description:
Magic Renamer AI is a Figma plugin that lets you automatically rename all your layers in one click (up to 120 layers at once, with design token support).


With AI, it suggests clear and consistent names that follow design and design system best practices.


üî•Key features:


  1. Smart, instant renaming: The AI analyzes your file and suggests relevant names for each layer.
  2. Time-saving: No more manual renaming‚Äîeverything is done in seconds, even for large files.
  3. Clarity and consistency: Naming conventions are enforced, making teamwork easier.
  4. Simple interface: One-click use, no complicated setup. Advanced options are available if you need them.
  5. Design token support: Perfect for solo or teams using advanced design systems.
  6. Custom API support: Use your own API key (OpenAI, DeepSeek, Perplexity, or OpenRouter) for more control.


üí° Why choose Magic Renamer AI?

Unlike other plugins, Magic Renamer AI uses artificial intelligence to understand the context of each layer and suggest names tailored to your project. It ensures consistency, reduces errors, and fits seamlessly into your Figma workflow. It‚Äôs the perfect tool to save time, improve file quality, and speed up your design process.

plugins.name: Variable Length Lorem Ipsum
plugins.description:
Most text generator plugins let you specify a single number for the word count. However, sometimes you want to specify a range instead, to introduce variability, and create more realistic results (realistic for lorem ipsum text, that is)


Features:

  1. Generates lorem ipsum text with the option of varied lengths.
  2. Enter a single number (e.g., "10") for fixed word count or a range (e.g., "5-10") for random variation within limits.
  3. Optionally add punctuation for generated text (default: off).
  4. Optionally auto-close the plugin after generating text (default: off).
  5. Supports your system setting for light or dark mode.
plugins.tagline: Specify a range of lengths for your lorem ipsum text

plugins.name: SupaFastPages
plugins.description:
This plugin helps designers and teams using Figma to automatically convert sections in a design into separate pages. This can be especially useful when you want to organise your Figma document by moving grouped content (like artboards or frames in a section) into new individual pages.


Key Features:

1. Convert Sections to Pages: The plugin scans the current Figma document and identifies sections (grouped content marked by Figma as "sections"). For each section it finds, the plugin creates a new page with the same name as the section or a default name if none is provided.

2. Move Children to New Pages: It transfers all the child nodes (like frames, components, and groups) inside the section to the newly created page. This helps in better organization and management of design files, where each section is neatly placed into its own page.

3. Remove Empty Sections: Once the children are moved to the new page, the original section is removed, leaving the workspace clean and organized.
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly convert sections into organized pages for a cleaner Figma workspace.

109166.release_notes:
1. UI Adjustments and Styling

‚Ä¢Dialog Box Sizing: Set the dimensions explicitly using figma.showUI(__html__, { width: 260, height: 320 }) in code.ts to ensure the interface displays without scrolling.
‚Ä¢Glassmorphic Background: Updated the container background to use a semi-transparent style with blur and shadow effects, enhancing the visual appeal.
‚Ä¢Font Updates: Applied SF Pro font styling to various elements to maintain a consistent and professional look.

2. Button Behavior Enhancement

‚Ä¢Dynamic Button Text: The Convert button initially displays ‚ÄúSelect an Option‚Äù and is disabled. When the user selects either ‚ÄúSections‚Äù or ‚ÄúFrames,‚Äù the text changes to ‚ÄúConvert,‚Äù and the button becomes enabled.
‚Ä¢Button Style Changes: Updated the styling of the disabled and enabled states of the button to use appropriate gradients and colors, making the active state more visually distinct.

3. Selection Feedback

‚Ä¢Option Selection Toggle: Added visual feedback for option selection. When ‚ÄúSections‚Äù or ‚ÄúFrames‚Äù is selected, it highlights in red while the unselected option remains grey.
‚Ä¢Single Selection at a Time: Ensured that only one option can be selected at a time, with the other being deselected.

4. User Guidance

‚Ä¢Clear Instruction via Button: By changing the button text dynamically based on the selection, the update guides users through the necessary steps (selecting an option) before conversion, improving usability.
109166.tagline: Effortlessly convert sections into organized pages for a cleaner Figma workspace.
